name: What is right?
description:
Intro: Aliens attack earth, because they think humans destroy this earth. Show them, that humans are not that stupid!


Platform: Android and WebGL
Controls: Drag and drop the boxes to the right way. (Kill baby=bad)
Features:

  • GOOD MODE: be good to win!
  • EVIL MODE: be evil to win!
  • Timer: Decide quick!
  • Winner: Every time you do it right, an alien "goes back to his homeplanet". no aliens = you win!

(Android version only!):

  • Humans that cheer for you
  • Kills per minute display when you win
  • performance update: no more lag then
  • better start menu

What do you think about the game? What can be improved?
